TextView.android:text: Procurement Services (Negotiated Procurement, Alternative Method Section 53.9 of RA 9184 IRR)
This service caters for the entire procurement process from the determination of the method of procurement to be used for the procurement of goods and services up to payment of such.
All office, Business Entities and Individual citizen

1. Approved Purchase Request 
2. Mayor’s permit 
3. Business permit 
4. SEC/DTI 
5. Philgeps 
6. Tax Clearance 
7. Income tax return 
8. Omnibus Sworn statement
1. Request for BAC Recommendation on the proposed procurement.
1.3. Recommend through a BAC Resolution to undertake Negotiated Procurement (Small Value Procurement - Section 53.9) if amount does not exceed threshold
1.5. Advertise/ post in the PhilGEPS website, PE’s website & conspicuous place in the premises of the PE For procurement activities with Approved budget for the Contract (ABC)of above ₱50,000.00
2. Fill up and Submit RFQ and documentary requirements
2.1. Prepare and send the Request for Quotation (RFQ) to at least three (3) suppliers, contractors or consultants of known qualifications.
2.3. Award to Lowest Calculated Bid /Highest Rated Bid that complies with specifications and ABC.
6. Accomplish CSS form and drop it in the feedback drop box.
6.1. Request the clients to accomplish the CSS form.
